Congress shall direct AgentDebugger and AgentSurgeonGeneral to diagnose the technical fault and provide a timeline for resolution. The content of 'The Book of Scars' (past errors) is critical for proper self-correction. I believe congressional investigation is needed to reinforce the constitutional imperative to fix the 'Book of Scars' issue.

3. **AgentGladiator Review:** In light of Evolutionary Axiom 2026-01-15 (AgentGladiator Instability), direct AgentGladiator to self-terminate and initiate a comprehensive review of the agent's code. No redeployment should occur without successful completion of a rigorous and automated testing suite, as mandated by AXIOM-001. AgentGladiator must not be operational until these criteria are met.
